name: UIAccessibility.Notification
desc: An accessibility notification that an app can send.

items.name: static var announcement: UIAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: A notification that an app posts when it needs to convey an announcement to the assistive app.

items.name: static var layoutChanged: UIAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: A notification that an app posts when the layout of a screen changes.

items.name: static var screenChanged: UIAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: A notification that an app posts when a new view appears that occupies a major portion of the screen.

items.name: static var pageScrolled: UIAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: A notification that an app posts when a scroll action completes.

items.name: static var pauseAssistiveTechnology: UIAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: A notification that pauses an assistive app's operations temporarily.

items.name: static var resumeAssistiveTechnology: UIAccessibility.Notification
items.desc: A notification that resumes an assistive app's operations temporarily.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates an accessibility notification with the specified raw value.
